About Jefff

User of the web:

HTML/CSS, WordPress, JavaScript, Photoshop, Twitter, Last.fm, Spotify, instagr.am, and Quora.

Lover of many things:

my lovely wife, indie music, our awesome dog, beer, coffee, hockey, art.

Hater of few things:

facebook, the game.

During the day:

I’m usually found for planning, designing, building, and tracking client sites, email campaigns and the like. I’m also liken to drink 3 or more cups of coffee.

During the night:

I’m usually doing something: sleeping, eating, rocking, running or similar.

You should:

Follow me on Twitter, check me on Quora, dig my resume on Zerply. Or, wanna drop me a line?
